attributes.action: Give everyone the day off work if England get to the final off euro 2021
attributes.additional_details:
It's the first final england have got to since 1966 
It will bring the country together in a stressful time 
Many people will be phoning in sick so it avoids that problem
attributes.background:
Let everyone have the day off If England get to the final 
It will help boost country moral 
It will be the only good thing the government has done in the last 12 months

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Give the UK a Bank Holiday on Monday July 12th if England win Euro 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590282

Bank Holiday Monday if England get to the finals of the Euro’s 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590584
